original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, where you'll be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations. As a key player in our organization, you'll ensure our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently, with a particular focus on developing new processes and technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space. You'll leverage cutting-edge Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to quickly develop innovative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows, and ensure clear and concise communication.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing tools such as database querying, report generation, and data visualization.
- Continuously seek opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and improvement.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Proven experience in vehicle configuration processes and systems

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in implementing and integrating Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using database querying tools, reporting, and data visualization software
- Familiarity with configuration management and version control systems

This role is a strategic blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you'll be responsible for bridging the gap between complex business processes and effective system configurations. As a technical leader in our organization, you'll play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to drive continuous improvement.

Key Responsibilities:
- Establish and maintain strong collaborative relationships with stakeholders across various departments, demonstrating exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and ensure clear and concise knowledge transfer.
- Translate complex business requirements into highly effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining detailed configuration specifications, creating and optimizing data mappings and integrations, implementing and rigorously testing new configurations, and proactively troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Conduct in-depth data analysis to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing advanced database querying, report generation, and data visualization tools to generate actionable insights.
- Continuously seek and implement innovative ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the strategic application of configuration changes and industry best practices.
- Spearhead the development and execution of comprehensive testing strategies, ensuring configurations meet or exceed requirements and function flawlessly, while actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate solutions.
- Maintain meticulous documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps, serving as a subject matter expert and providing ongoing support to developers, IT support, and other stakeholders.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail
- Highly effective communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Proven expertise in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficient in Java and SQL, with a strong understanding of database concepts

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Extensive experience in vehicle configuration processes and systems

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated success in the design, development, and integration of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Hands-on experience with Agile methodologies and their implementation in a collaborative, cross-functional environment
- Deep understanding of vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- Mastery of database querying tools, reporting software, and advanced data visualization techniques
- Proficiency in configuration management and version control systems

This role is a strategic intersection of business acumen and technical prowess, where you'll be responsible for bridging the gap between complex business processes and cutting-edge system configurations. As a technical leader in our organization, you'll play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at the highest levels of efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to drive continuous improvement and stay ahead of the curve.
